A Division of Responsibility 

                            St. Helena, California, August 4, 1903. 

To the Leaders in the Medical Work-- 


     Dear Brethren: I have a message for you. I am instructed to say that not all the arrangements connected with the management of the medical missionary work are to originate in Battle Creek. The medical missionary work is God's work, and in every conference and every church we are to take a decided stand against allowing it to be selfishly controlled.
